comment._content: I was in this town in 1992 and hiked to the top of the mountain overlooking it... It is the most beautiful place I have ever visited in my life and this photo brought back those memories. Just great.

comment.author: 10621515@N05
comment._content: That was before the road was build to Dalsnibba - that picturesque viewpoint

comment.author: 25959337@N00
comment._content:
Very nice old photo, before the lowland became forested.

The mountain to the right is NOT Dalsnibba, but Vinsås. 
To the right of  Vinsås is a 3-4 km long valley (Opplendskedalen) you have to pass before you start climbing up to Dalsnibba.

comment.author: 84499024@N02
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/30416668@N00] 

My greatgrandfather visited Merok, Norway in the 1920's.  My brother hopes to go at the end of August.  How easy is it now to get to Merok?  Is it within walking distance of Geiranger village?  Thanks.
